main event: An unidentified green disc-shaped object was observed by at least 63 military and civilian witnesses over Larson Air Force Base in Moses Lake, Washington on January 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object was stationary for fifteen minutes before moving in a southeasterly direction while gaining altitude., The size of the object was compared to a large weather balloon., No sound was emitted from the object during the observation., At least 63 reliable witnesses reported the sighting, including military personnel., The object decreased in size until it disappeared completely.
